messages.subject: Re: Need fellowship---here is an IDEA
messages.msgSnippet: I am Stephanie, married to Ron, in Port Huron, Michigan. We have Martin - 9, James - 8, Stacie - 5, and Tiffany - 4. we are homeschooling for many reasons, and
messages.messageBody:
I am Stephanie, married to Ron, in Port Huron, Michigan. We have Martin - 9,
James - 8, Stacie - 5, and Tiffany - 4. we are homeschooling for many
reasons, and unschool (primarily) for many more. James is our part timer
(Dad/Mom) and we are looking for a home in Kansas.

Blessings,
Stephanie
Teacher and Mommy of 4 homeschooling fanatics, wife to the best principal,
protector of many pets and wild ones, and unpublished writer.
***Life's Learnings Academy - Protecting Our Children***
IT'S GREAT TO LEARN WHERE THE PRINCIPAL LOVES YOU
ICQ: 43428000 AOL IM: Lifeslearn

messages.subject: Re: Need fellowship---here is an IDEA
messages.msgSnippet: Great idea Susan!!!!!! I am Laura.  We live in Port Orange, FL.  (Near Daytona Beach)  My husband s name is Harold.  We have three beautiful children.  We
messages.messageBody:
Great idea Susan!!!!!!

I am Laura. We live in Port Orange, FL. (Near Daytona Beach) My husband's
name is Harold. We have three beautiful children. We unschool our two
daughters. Kayla (10) and Lydia (6). Our son, Jake, is 9 months old.

We are Christians, but are do not agree with the "politics" of church. We do
attend a church though.

We are looking forward to meeting some fellow unschoolers in our area.

messages.subject: Re: Need fellowship---here is an IDEA
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hey - don t leave Jake out.  He s definitely an unschooler at that age!  :-) Diane in KS
messages.messageBody:
> daughters. Kayla (10) and Lydia (6). Our son, Jake, is 9 months old.
>
Hey - don't leave Jake out. He's definitely an unschooler at that
age! :-)

Diane in KS

Good idea Susan. I'm Diane and I live in Manhattan, Kansas - home
of Kansas State University - where dh teaches. I have two kids -
well.....one isn't a kid anymore. Mandy is 19 and lives on her own,
attending college part time. Kyle is 13. We've been die-hard
unschoolers since Kyle was 10.

messages.subject: Re: Need fellowship---here is an IDEA
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/1/99 12:32:59 AM Eastern Standard Time, Stuff@ptdprolog.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/1/99 12:32:59 AM Eastern Standard Time,
Stuff@... writes:

<< I am Susan and I live in PA---45 minutes Northish of Allentown---with TED
(partner) and My 6 chickens--Brittany (10) Jakob (9) Savannah (6) Indigo
(5) Katsura (3) Ozawa (1)--We primarily Unschool with no religious
base....We all enjoy reading and riding bikes etc...Outdoors hiking camping
that sort of thing...the kids play instruments and take dance and
participate in sports >>

I'm Laura who lives in Cols. Oh with 5 of my 6 boys and my dh. I don't know
if we school,homeschool or unschool yet. I basically am trying to just keep
going. I'm hsing with my 8 &11 yro. We are practicing Catholics though I hs
for that and other reasons. (I detest ps)

Laura

messages.subject: Re: Need fellowship---here is an IDEA
messages.msgSnippet: ... now. ... hanging out kind of stuff.  Not to say that the list isn t fun to read.... but it isn t the same as meeting in person. ... we d be pleased to
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
> From: Gingles29@...
>
> Hello. My name is Laura and I have been reading these posts for a while
now.
> I have just recently started unschooling my two girls.
> We are in need of some friends to do "field trips" and just general fun
"hanging out" kind of stuff. Not to say that the list isn't fun to read....
but it isn't the same as meeting in person.
> We live in the Daytona Beach, FL area. If there is anyone out there...
we'd be pleased to meet you...................................
..............<<<SNIPPETY***.........

OH that reminds me...... you know what I was thinking today (do you have
ESP?)...that we could all send an e-mail around and put our kids and their
ages on it and our names and where we live and anything else we wanted and
keep cutting and pasting until it is a list of everyone on the list who
wants to participate---then we would have a better idea huh??? (then some
**LIKE ME** can print it to remember who is who)
SOS
Ok so I guess I will start it
I am Susan and I live in PA---45 minutes Northish of Allentown---with TED
(partner) and My 6 chickens--Brittany (10) Jakob (9) Savannah (6) Indigo
(5) Katsura (3) Ozawa (1)--We primarily Unschool with no religious
base....We all enjoy reading and riding bikes etc...Outdoors hiking camping
that sort of thing...the kids play instruments and take dance and
participate in sports
